_sText:
At this map, I decided to show you some traditions of my country Spain.

At this bullring there are 2 bulls (Terrorists) and "x" bullfighters (counterterrorist).

Terrorists have got a "skin of a bull" with a funny face and horns to catch bullfighters. They have to kill to the others before of 105 seconds or the bulls will die!

Counterterrorists have to dodge the other team. Jumping on the bulls or doing "cuts".

The name of my map is the name of my city and the bullring of my city is a bit similar.
At the beginning of a round, you could lisent a sound of the bullring like in the real life.

It is a bit similiar to the bullring of my city.
Do not worroy about the time of the round becoause I add the commands to change it.
The round start with 1.45 min to left. No autobalance and no limiteams. After 1.45 min the bulls will die.
HF and remember the vocabulary because if you come to Spain, you can need it XD

VOCABULARY:

Ol√©: If you do something nice to the bull.

Toro: Bull.

Eh toro!: If you want that they see you.

Map wtih COPYLEFT. Have fun!

(I do not why but the web side delated my map)

Thanks to !PosTi85
